exec: errorif(inserted(branch_type)='PUBLIC' and inserted(branch_sts)='REVIEW','Cannot set branch_sts REVIEW on PUBLIC branch');
errorif(inserted(branch_type)='DEPLOYMENT' and inserted(branch_sts)<>'ARCHIVE','DEPLOYMENT branch must have branch_sts ARCHIVE');
errorif(inserted(branch_merge_id)=inserted(branch_id),'Branch cannot merge with itself');
errorif((inserted(branch_merge_id) is not null) and (inserted(branch_merge_type) is null),'branch_merge_id requires branch_merge_type');

errorif(update(branch_name) and exists(select * from {schema}.branch b2 where b2.branch_name=inserted(branch_name) and $ifnull(b2.branch_user_id,0)=$ifnull(inserted(branch_user_id),0) and b2.site_id=inserted(site_id)),'Another branch with the same name already exists');
set(branch_mtstmp,%%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%);
set(branch_muser,%%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%%);
setif(update(branch_sts),branch_sts_tstmp,%%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%);
setif(update(branch_sts),branch_sts_user,%%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%%);
setif(update(branch_review_sts),branch_review_sts_tstmp,%%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%);
setif(update(branch_review_sts),branch_review_sts_user,%%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%%);
update branch_page set page_merge_id=null,branch_page_merge_action=null where (branch_id=inserted(branch_id) and update(branch_merge_id));
update branch_media set media_merge_id=null,branch_media_merge_action=null where (branch_id=inserted(branch_id) and update(branch_merge_id));
update branch_menu set menu_merge_id=null,branch_menu_merge_action=null where (branch_id=inserted(branch_id) and update(branch_merge_id));
update branch_sitemap set sitemap_merge_id=null,branch_sitemap_merge_action=null where (branch_id=inserted(branch_id) and update(branch_merge_id));
update branch_redirect set redirect_merge_id=null,branch_redirect_merge_action=null where (branch_id=inserted(branch_id) and update(branch_merge_id));
setif((inserted(branch_merge_id) is null) and (inserted(branch_merge_type) is not null),branch_merge_type,null);
setif(inserted(branch_sts)='REVIEW' and inserted(branch_review_sts) is null,branch_review_sts,'PENDING');
update {schema}.branch set branch_parent_id = null where branch_parent_id = deleted(branch_id);
errorif(inserted(branch_menu_action)='DELETE' and null(inserted(menu_orig_id)),'menu_orig_id is required for DELETE action');
errorif(inserted(branch_menu_action)='UPDATE' and null(inserted(menu_id)),'menu_id is required for UPDATE action');
errorif(inserted(branch_menu_action)='UPDATE' and null(inserted(menu_orig_id)),'menu_orig_id is required for UPDATE action');
errorif(inserted(branch_menu_action)='ADD' and null(inserted(menu_id)),'menu_id is required for ADD action');
errorif(inserted(branch_menu_action)='ADD' and not(null(inserted(menu_orig_id))),'menu_orig_id must be null for ADD action');

errorif((inserted(branch_menu_merge_action) is not null or inserted(menu_merge_id) is not null) and exists(select * from {schema}.branch where branch_id=inserted(branch_id) and branch_merge_id is null),'Cannot set merge data when no merge is in progress');
set(branch_menu_mtstmp,%%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%);
set(branch_menu_muser,%%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%%);
setif(branch_menu.branch_menu_action='DELETE',menu_id,null);
update branch set branch_data_mtstmp = %%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%, branch_data_muser = %%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%% where branch_id = inserted(branch_id);
update branch set branch_data_mtstmp = %%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%, branch_data_muser = %%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%% where branch_id = deleted(branch_id);

(select top1(branch_id from {schema}.branch where branch_name='master' and branch_user_id is null))

exec: set(sys_user_branch_mtstmp,%%%%%%jsh.map.timestamp%%%%%%);
set(sys_user_branch_muser,%%%%%%jsh.map.current_user%%%%%%);

caption: Branch
Branches

columns.name: branch_access
columns.sqlselect: case when branch_type='DEPLOYMENT' then 'R' when {schema}.my_user_is_publisher() = 1 then 'RW' else decode(branch_type, 'PUBLIC', 'R', 'USER', decode(branch_sts,'ACTIVE','RW','R')) end

v_my_branch_access.where: branch_id in (select branch_id from {schema}.branch where branch_type='PUBLIC' or branch_type='DEPLOYMENT' or ({schema}.my_user_is_publisher() = 1) or (branch_user_id = jsharmony.my_sys_user_id()))

columns.name: branch_desc
columns.sqlselect: concat(site_name,'/',(case branch_type when 'DEPLOYMENT' then 'deployment' when 'PUBLIC' then 'public' else (select concat(sys_user_fname,' ',sys_user_lname) from jsharmony.sys_user where jsharmony.sys_user.sys_user_id=branch_user_id) end),'/',branch_name,(case branch_access when 'R' then ' (Read-only)' else '' end))

exec: errorif((inserted(new_branch_id) is not null) and (not exists(select * from {schema}.v_my_branch_access where {schema}.v_my_branch_access.branch_id=inserted(new_branch_id))),'User does not have access to branch')
insert into {schema}.sys_user_branch(sys_user_id) select jsharmony.my_sys_user_id() where not exists(select * from {schema}.sys_user_branch where sys_user_id=jsharmony.my_sys_user_id())
update {schema}.sys_user_branch set branch_id = inserted(new_branch_id) where sys_user_id = jsharmony.my_sys_user_id()

errorif((inserted(branch_parent_id) is not null) and not exists(select * from {schema}.v_my_branch_access where {schema}.v_my_branch_access.branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id)),'User does not have access to source branch')

errorif(exists(select * from {schema}.branch where {schema}.branch.branch_type=inserted(branch_type) and {schema}.branch.branch_name=inserted(branch_name) and ({schema}.branch.branch_type='PUBLIC' or ({schema}.branch.branch_user_id=jsharmony.my_sys_user_id()))),'The target branch name already exists')
errorif(exists(select 1 where (inserted(branch_type)='PUBLIC' or inserted(branch_type)='DEPLOYMENT') and ({schema}.my_user_is_publisher() = 0)),'User does not have access to add public branches')
insert into {schema}.sys_user_branch(sys_user_id) select jsharmony.my_sys_user_id() where not exists(select * from {schema}.sys_user_branch where sys_user_id=jsharmony.my_sys_user_id())
clear_insert_identity()

insert into {schema}.branch(branch_parent_id, branch_type, branch_name, branch_sts, site_id, branch_user_id) values(inserted(branch_parent_id), inserted(branch_type), inserted(branch_name), 'ACTIVE', $ifnull((select site_id from {schema}.branch where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id)), inserted(site_id)), (case when inserted(branch_type)='PUBLIC' then null else jsharmony.my_sys_user_id() end))
update {schema}.sys_user_branch set branch_id = last_insert_identity() where sys_user_id = jsharmony.my_sys_user_id()

insert into {schema}.branch_menu(branch_id, menu_key, menu_id, branch_menu_action, menu_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), menu_key, menu_id, branch_menu_action, menu_orig_id from {schema}.branch_menu where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'COPY'

insert into {schema}.branch_page(branch_id, page_key, page_id, branch_page_action, page_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), page_key, page_id, branch_page_action, page_orig_id from {schema}.branch_page where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'COPY'

insert into {schema}.branch_media(branch_id, media_key, media_id, branch_media_action, media_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), media_key, media_id, branch_media_action, media_orig_id from {schema}.branch_media where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'COPY'

insert into {schema}.branch_redirect(branch_id, redirect_key, redirect_id, branch_redirect_action, redirect_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), redirect_key, redirect_id, branch_redirect_action, redirect_orig_id from {schema}.branch_redirect where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'COPY'

insert into {schema}.branch_sitemap(branch_id, sitemap_key, sitemap_id, branch_sitemap_action, sitemap_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), sitemap_key, sitemap_id, branch_sitemap_action, sitemap_orig_id from {schema}.branch_sitemap where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'COPY'

insert into {schema}.branch_menu(branch_id, menu_key, menu_id, menu_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), menu_key, menu_id, menu_id from {schema}.branch_menu where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and menu_id is not null and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'RESET'

insert into {schema}.branch_page(branch_id, page_key, page_id, page_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), page_key, page_id, page_id from {schema}.branch_page where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and page_id is not null and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'RESET'

insert into {schema}.branch_media(branch_id, media_key, media_id, media_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), media_key, media_id, media_id from {schema}.branch_media where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and media_id is not null and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'RESET'

insert into {schema}.branch_redirect(branch_id, redirect_key, redirect_id, redirect_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), redirect_key, redirect_id, redirect_id from {schema}.branch_redirect where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and redirect_id is not null and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'RESET'

insert into {schema}.branch_sitemap(branch_id, sitemap_key, sitemap_id, sitemap_orig_id) select {schema}.my_current_branch_id(), sitemap_key, sitemap_id, sitemap_id from {schema}.branch_sitemap where branch_id=inserted(branch_parent_id) and sitemap_id is not null and $ifnull(inserted(new_branch_changes),'RESET') = 'RESET'
